    wildRtrax

    Overview

    The wildRtrax (pronounced ‘wilder tracks’) package provides a set of functions for environmental sensor data (autonomous recording units and remote game cameras) management to and from WildTrax.

    Installation

    You can install the development version of wildRtrax directly from this repository with:

    # install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("ABbiodiversity/wildRtrax")

    Issues

    To report bugs, request additional features, or get help using the package, please file an issue. Alternatively, you can email Alex MacPhail agmacpha@ualberta.ca or Marcus Becker mabecker@ualberta.ca.
